text:
Hi All,

I am not getting additional details like Product&Services, DealCost, CLientDetails in Deals API. Can someone help me in this. Also Is there anyway I can filter the details based on particular properties like CreatedDate, DealStatus. Please Help
<@U04G3HAKNLQ> You forgot to add the *hashtag ( #ccc)* in the first image.
Thanks for the answer! i've already correct it and stillnot working... I should be expecting that tha background color changes from #ccc to #fff and thats it? Right?
For that type of thing you'll want to use the search endpoint: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/search>

You can specify which properties you want returned with the properties parameter, and the filters you want with the filter parameter: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/search#filter-search-results>
the global editor is not allowing me to publish changes and throws a 404 error in the console – no other message provided
we're also having problems with publishing theme settings, loading resources in page editor, and all kinds of unstable CMS performance issues

Hi folks. I have a use-case where I'd like to define a form in HubSpot, embed that form in many different landing pages (so it should be reusable). Upon form submission I want to redirect the user to an arbitrary url and pass along the data that was submitted in the form along with the utm info. What is the recommended way to accomplish this?

I've begun to go down a path of customizing the embed script to call `onFormSubmitted` and manually building up the payload and redirecting the user, but it feels a bit hack-y.

I'm also trying to find a current API reference for `hbspt.forms.create` to understand the behavior of the form submission hooks (i.e. does the HubSpot configured behavior fire, or does setting the callback override this behavior?)

Hey Guys, How to retrieve calls and associated contacts with that call from HubSpot using api. I used call list api endpoint to get all calls and I am not sure how to link those calls to contacts ? can someone please help me with it ?
hey could use some help rate limiting custom code in a workflow. It quickly hits the secondly and 10 secondly limit, and not sure how to prevent this.

Hello—is it possible to use HubSpot forms offline? Does anyone have a solution for this—that is, for submitting the form offline and then syncing the data up when back online? My scenario would be using a HubSpot form at an event that does not have WiFi.
hey all...i'm struggling with getting the right  phone format(<tel:5555555555|555-555-5555>)  on a embedded HubSpot form for a phone input, currently it's 5555555555?
Hi <@U04G3HAKNLQ> In the second image, removed the *comma* in *"background_color": "#fff"*
